Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks

Class ActiveTaskList

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.AbstractTaskList
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.tasks.ActiveTaskList
public class ActiveTaskList extends AbstractTaskList
Class represents an active task list, extending AbstractTaskList for tasks with an active boolean value set to true. TaskList methods provide functionality for managing tasks in an active list.
Author:
Austin Warren and Brynn Reed

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task task)
      Overrides the method to check that the Task is active before adding to the end of the ISwapList.
      Overrides:
      addTask in class AbstractTaskList
      Parameters:
      task - a task to be added to the active task list
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Task is not active

    • setTaskListName

      public void setTaskListName(String name)
      Overrides the method to ensure that the paramter value matches the expected name. If so, the name is set. If not, throws IAE.
      Overrides:
      setTaskListName in class AbstractTaskList
      Parameters:
      name - a string value for the name to be checked
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name parameter does not match "Active Tasks" if the parameter does not match the expected name

    • getTasksAsArray

      public String[][] getTasksAsArray()
      Returns a 2D String array where the first column is the name of the TaskList that the Task belongs to (or at least the TaskList at index 0) and the name of the Task.
      Specified by:
      getTasksAsArray in class AbstractTaskList
      Returns:
      a 2D string array for the task list information

    • clearTasks

      public void clearTasks()
